Title: Das Boot
Writer: Wolfgang Petersen, Lothar G. Buchheim (based on the novel by)
Actors: Jürgen Prochnow, Herbert Grönemeyer, Klaus Wennemann, Hubertus Bengsch
Plot: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth and sheer terror.
Awards: Nominated for 6 Oscars. Another 13 wins & 5 nominations.
Production: Bavaria Film, Westdeutscher Rundfunk, Radiant Productions
